title: Old Curious George Cartoons
description:
A bunch of old Curious George the monkey cartoons.  VHS Rips from my cartoon collection.  Cartoons included are:

Curious George at the Ballet

Curious George Goes Sledding

Curious George Coes to an Art Show

Curious George Goes to the Aquarium

Curious George Plays Basketball

Curious George Walks the Pets



Here&#039;s the story.  I am converting all of my old "Fan Tapes" over from VHS to DVD and also ripping them to AVI files.
Hopefully I can post up some videos that are hard to find and help add to other peoples collections. There is a lot of 
of animation as well as some live action.  Sorry if the quality  is lacking on some of these old shows. Please try to 
remember that they are coming off of home recorded video tapes. Some of them are copies of copies and the tapes
have been in storage for a while. I have my system set for the best quality rip I can get, but I can only do so much.
Would love to hear feedback!  Check out my other Torrents at:
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/user/SlumLord301/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/user/SlumLord301/</a>

I am looking to hear from other American Animation collectors.  Especially collectors of Hanna-Barbera ,
Freleng/DePatie,  Jay Ward Studios, and others.  I have a long want list for animation in my collection.  Everything 
I have on tape is eventually going to be posted as Torrents.  I will share everything I have with whomever wants it.
If you have files or knowledge to share please e-mail me at:
